author: archiron
body:
The configuration files have been modified and/or added to take electronPt1000 histos into account.
A new branch have bee added (EgammaV/ElectronMcSignalValidatorPt1000).

tests with runTheMatrix.py over 4.22 5.1 135.4 8.0 140.53 4.53 1306.0 101.0 1000.0 1001.0 1330.0 9.0 1003.0 25.0 25202.0 are OK and do not show significant size increase on DQM_V0001*.root files.

![pt1000-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5586847/6597358/545aa934-c7fc-11e4-9852-1fdf86405025.jpg)

@beaudett
title: Electron Validation Pt1000 histos
